entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:40AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER CONTINUES STEADY RISE... The Salmon River has been rising since Sunday due to warm temperatures at elevation causing snow melt into the basin and a possible release from Summit Lake.
